# Software {#sec-software}

ICTML combines the strengths of [rtemis](https://rtemis.org), the 
[TLverse](https://tlverse.org/), and the [futureverse](https://www.futureverse.org/) to provide a
highly efficient, user-friendly, and scalable end-to-end platform for machine learning and causal
inference.
